definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage

sentences.english: But this is as speculative as Fenner's gloomy forecast.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這和芬納悲觀的預測一樣都是推測性的。

sentences.english: The signals create images of your heart that can help your doctor determine the cause of your heart arrhythmia.
sentences.chinese: 通過檢測信號就可以對心臟成像並幫助醫生推測病因。

sentences.english: Zhuge Liang speculated that the river would be covered by fog in three days, which saved himself later.
sentences.chinese: 諸葛亮推測三日後江面有霧，他的推測救了自己。

sentences.english: Zhuge Liang speculated that the river would be covered by fog in three days, which saved himself later.
sentences.chinese: 諸葛亮推測三日後江面有霧，他的推測救了自己。

sentences.english: There is widespread speculation about what caused their disappearance.
sentences.chinese: 至於他們消失的原因有好多種推測。

sentences.english: Octopus oracle Paul is predicting Germany will be defeated by Spain at the World Cup semifinal.
sentences.chinese: 八爪魚保羅推測德國在半決賽中將被西班牙戰勝。

sentences.english: I guess the whole batch is running under 15 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 我推測整組都是在15秒內跑完的。

sentences.english: Then how in the name of all that is wonderful did you get these facts?
sentences.chinese: 可是你是怎麼神機妙算地推測出這些事實的？

sentences.english: One even speculated that summer sea ice would be gone in five years.
sentences.chinese: 一個科學家甚至推測夏季的海冰將在五年內消失。

sentences.english: GuoLiang Zhou speculated that surface of river has fog and his speculation save himself.
sentences.chinese: 諸葛亮推測三日後江面有霧，他的推測救了自己。

sentences.english: GuoLiang Zhou speculated that surface of river has fog and his speculation save himself.
sentences.chinese: 諸葛亮推測三日後江面有霧，他的推測救了自己。

sentences.english: Indeed, the answer to Why? usually ends up this way, speculative, unspecific.
sentences.chinese: 的確，對於爲什麼要去冒險，答案往往是推測性的。

sentences.english: It indicates that telomerase participates in the repair process of DNA injury induced by ionizing radiation.
sentences.chinese: 推測端粒酶參與電離輻射誘導DNA損傷的修復。

sentences.english: The Passion ratio is an efficient parameter inferring the constitution of earth interior.
sentences.chinese: 泊松比是推測地球內部物質構成的有效參數之一。

sentences.english: It is speculated that the sediment core is not polluted by thallium at present.
sentences.chinese: 由此推測，該處沉積物當前未受到明顯的鉈污染。

sentences.english: The Musas’ deaths, he predicted, would become just another statistic.
sentences.chinese: 他推測，穆薩父女之死只不過是又一統計數據罷了。

definition: to conclude/to determine/to come to a judgment
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
